thread.title: British tourists try to catch snake in hotel room in India
thread.title_full: British tourists try to catch snake in hotel room in India

title: British tourists try to catch snake in hotel room in India
text: Share this article Share Eventually the man with the bag manages to corner the snake but he drops the plastic at the last minute and the reptile once again slithers free. 'It's really fast,' the filmer says as he watches his friend chase the snake around the room. 'Oh dear I'm standing on the bed, ' he adds as the reptile continues to evade capture He continues to offer an alarmed narration despite his more courageous pal insisting, 'Everything's going to be fine.' Eventually the man with the bag manages to corner the snake ... but he drops the plastic at the last minute and the reptile once again slithers free Eventually they had to wake their hostess and she removed it with a bucket and broom According to the man filming, who even falls over on the bed he's so afraid the snake has gone over his foot, they had just come home from a local bar when they discovered the unexpected guest. 'Chaos ensued,' the trio wrote online. 'We had to eventually wake our hostess and she removed it with a bucket and broom. 'We're still not sure whether it was venomous though it's unlikely.'
